iview::CCalibrationShapeBase Class Reference

Base class for all shapes using iview::IIsomorphicCalibration to transform between logical and physical positions. More...

#include <CCalibrationShapeBase.h>

Detailed Description

Base class for all shapes using iview::IIsomorphicCalibration to transform between logical and physical positions.

int iview::CCalibrationShapeBase::GetDisplayChangesMask ( ) [inline, protected, virtual]

Get display changes mask.

Only changes there are in mask will be accepted, rest will be ignored.

virtual void iview::CCalibrationShapeBase::OnConnectDisplay ( iview::IDisplay *  displayPtr) [virtual]

Called after display is connected.

It can be called only, when display is accepted (

See also:
IsDisplayAccepted()).
Parameters:
displayPtran observer object, which should be informed about all shape changes.
